text: Jules Bordet (June 13, 1870 - April 6, 1961) was a Belgian doctor and microbiologist. He won the 1919 Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine, for his discoveries about immunity. ==Related pages== *List of biologists == References == Category:1870 births Category:1961 deaths Category:Belgian Nobel Prize winners Category:Belgian physicians Category:People from Hainaut (province)
title: Jules Bordet
